artist: Artist: Kobayashi Kiyochika; Publisher: Fukuda Kumajirō
catalogue_raissonne: Shizuoka Mus., Kobayashi Kiyochika (exh. cat., 1998), #31; Smith, Kiyochika (exh. cat., Santa Barbara, 1988), #29
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: night scene, with body of water in foreground, and a house with illuminated windows on L; two shadowed figures in windows; dark trees obscure house; tiny dots of light over water
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Koromo River below Tennō-ji Temple
